secs since last heartbeat
func:
bts = msg.payload
last = bts.last_heartbeat
millis = Date.now() - last  
return {payload:millis/ 1000}

name: make command
remove active
func:
name = global.get("active_vehicle")
vs = global.get("vehicles")
if(name in vs){
    vs[name].bt_state.last_heartbeat = null
    global.set("active_vehicle", "")
    msg.payload = "Vehicle "+ name + " timed out"
    return msg
}

name: set active if first
adjust min/max
special map icons
info:
plane : a jet plane icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    smallplane : a light aircraft icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    ship : a ship icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    car : a car icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    bus : a bus/coach icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    uav : a small uav like icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    helicopter : a small helicopter icon that aligns with the heading of travel.
    arrow : a map GPS arrow type pointer that aligns with the heading of travel.
    wind : a wind arrow that points in the direction the wind is coming FROM.
    satellite : a small satellite icon.
    iss : a slightly larger icon for the ISS.
    locate : a 4 corner outline to locate a point without obscuring it.
    friend : pseudo NATO style blue rectangle. (see NATO SIDC option below)
    hostile : pseudo NATO style red circle.
    neutral : pseudo NATO style green square.
    unknown : pseudo NATO style yellow square.
    earthquake : black circle - diameter proportional to msg.mag.

name: vehicle_names
lines for current plan
func:
wps = msg.payload.waypoints
points = []
for(var i in wps){
        points.push([wps[i].lat, wps[i].lon])
}

switch(msg.payload.plan_state){
    case 0: //running
        c = "orange"
        w = 2
        break
    case 1: // stopped
        c = "red"
        w = 1
        break
    case 2: // paused
        c = "orange"
        w = 1
        break
    case 3: // emergency
        c = "red"
        w = 0.1
        break
    case 4: // received
        c = "yellow"
        w = 2
        break
}

line = {name: msg.vehicle_name+"_current_plan",
        layer: msg.vehicle_name,
        line:points,
        color:c,
        weight:w,
        editable:false,
        clickable:false,
        dashArray:"1,8,5,8"
}
return {payload:line}
rbe

name: Sweden.map
on_press
map buttons
robot_drs
robot_gps's
center map on selected robot
set map clickability
get/set selected wp
func:
reset = [
    {payload:""},
    {payload:""},
    {payload:""},
    {payload:""},
    {payload:false}
    ]
    
title = msg.payload.title
if(title == "--NO PLANS--" || title == "--NO WPS--") return reset

wp_name = title.slice(title.indexOf(">")+1)

global.set("gui.selected_waypoint_name", wp_name)




plan_name = global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")
plans = global.get("planning.plans")
if(!(plans)) return reset
plan = plans[plan_name]
if(!(plan)) return reset
swp = plan.waypoints[wp_name]
if(!(swp)) return reset

lat = (swp.lat+"").substring(0,9)
lon = (swp.lon+"").substring(0,9)

return [
    {payload: lat + ", "+ lon},
    {payload:swp.depth},
    {payload:swp.rpm},
    {payload:swp.speed},
    {payload:swp.use_rpm}
    ]

name: validate and edit WP
list plans
set selected plan

title = msg.payload.title
if(title == "--NO PLANS--") return
plan_name = title.slice(title.indexOf(">")+1)

global.set("gui.selected_plan_name", plan_name)

return {payload:plan_name}

label: New Plan
tooltip: Create a new empty mission plan

name: create and select new plan
list waypoints
point can only happen if planning mode = true
add new wp to selected_plan
func:
point = msg.payload
if(!point.name || point.name==="") return

plans = global.get("planning.plans")
if(!(plans)){
    node.warn("Plans:"+plans)
    return
}

plan_name = global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")
plan = plans[plan_name]


function new_wp(point){
    return {
        name:point.name,
        lat:point.lat,
        lon:point.lon,
        depth:0,
        rpm:0,
        speed:0,
        use_rpm:false
    }
}

wp = new_wp(point)
plan.waypoints[wp.name] = wp
plan.waypoint_order.push(wp.name)
plans[plan_name] = plan
global.set("planning.plans", plans)

return msg

name: Prepare rename
rename selected plan
func:
if(msg.payload == "Cancel") return

new_name = msg.payload

plans = global.get("planning.plans")
if(new_name in Object.keys(plans)) return

plan = plans[global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")]
delete plans[plan.name]

plan.name = new_name
plans[new_name] = plan
global.set("planning.plans", plans)
global.set("gui.selected_plan_name", new_name)

return {}

name: Prepare delete
delete selected plan
func:
if(msg.payload == "Cancel") return

plans = global.get("planning.plans")
plan = plans[global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")]
delete plans[plan.name]

global.set("planning.plans", plans)
global.set("gui.selected_plan_name", null)

return {}

name: accumulate drawn objects
Prepare rename
rename selected wp
func:
if(msg.payload == "Cancel") return

new_name = msg.payload

plans = global.get("planning.plans")
plan_name = global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")
plan = plans[plan_name]
if(new_name in Object.keys(plan.waypoints)) return

wp = plan.waypoints[global.get("gui.selected_waypoint_name")]
delete plan.waypoints[wp.name]

wp_i = plan.waypoint_order.indexOf(wp.name)
wp.name = new_name

plan.waypoints[new_name] = wp
plan.waypoint_order[wp_i] = wp.name


global.set("planning.plans", plans)
global.set("gui.selected_waypoint_name", new_name)

return {}

name: Prepare delete
delete selected wp
func:
if(msg.payload == "Cancel") return

plans = global.get("planning.plans")
plan = plans[global.get("gui.selected_plan_name")]
wp = plan.waypoints[global.get("gui.selected_waypoint_name")]
delete plan.waypoints[wp.name]
wp_i = plan.waypoint_order.indexOf(wp.name)
plan.waypoint_order.splice(wp_i, wp_i)


global.set("planning.plans", plans)
global.set("gui.selected_waypoint_name", null)

return {}

name: list tracks
new track
set selected track
func:
title = msg.payload.title
if(title == "--NO TRACKS--") return
track_name = title.slice(title.indexOf(">")+1)

global.set("gui.selected_track_name", track_name)

return {payload:track_name}

name: Prepare delete
delete selected track
func:
if(msg.payload == "Cancel") return

tracks = global.get("planning.tracks")
track = tracks[global.get("gui.selected_track_name")]
delete tracks[track.name]
drawn_tracks = global.get("gui.drawn_track_names")
drawn_tracks.delete(track.name)

global.set("planning.tracks", tracks)
global.set("gui.selected_track_name", null)
global.set("gui.drawn_track_names", drawn_tracks)

return {}

name: Prepare rename
func:
name = global.get("gui.selected_track_name")
if(!name) return
rtn = global.get("gui.recording_track_name")
if(name == rtn) return
return {payload:"Rename "+ name}

name: rename selected track
func:
if(msg.payload == "Cancel") return

new_name = msg.payload

tracks = global.get("planning.tracks")
if(new_name in Object.keys(tracks)) return

track = tracks[global.get("gui.selected_track_name")]
delete tracks[track.name]
drawn_tracks = global.get("gui.drawn_track_names")
drawn_tracks.delete(track.name)


track.name = new_name
tracks[new_name] = track
drawn_tracks.add(new_name)
global.set("planning.tracks", tracks)
global.set("gui.selected_track_name", new_name)
global.set("gui.drawn_track_names", drawn_tracks)

return {}
